Capitol .xliii.	And when you see that the wound is already clean, then apply the cream of generative flesh within which it should heal.
De seccio del pilhot del apostema accident dintz le guolayro.	Of the section of the blister in the abscess under the sole.
Diyssero les antics aquesta seccio en le epilhot, e no vist alcu hom en nostra terra que aquela aia fayta.	They say that the ancients performed this section of the blister in the epilhit, and no one in our land has ever seen it done.
E aquesta es la inscriptura del sermo de aquels.	And this is the inscription of the speech of those.
Mays en les homes haventz esquinencia, cove que sia esquivada la extraccio del epilhot, cum per aquo no sia fayt juvament per so quar totas las venas e las majors del malaute so aqui.	Yet in men with stiffness, a cavity should be avoided during the removal of the blister, for if this is not done properly, it could harm all the veins and major arteries of the thigh.
Mays en aquels que han apostemas cautz en la boca o guolayro o dos aurelhas, quan la malautia no es en la cana, cove husar de la seccio de epilhot a fugir la perdicio la qual es fayta per perfocacio.	Yet in those who have abscesses on the mouth or sole of the foot or ears, when the illness is not in the brain, it is advisable to use the section of the blister to avoid the damage caused by perforation.
Donc cove quan volem aquo, que inscidam le epilhot dejos tres cercles dels cercles del epilhot, o quatre am petita seccio per la latitut en aquel que es entre dos cercles per quantitat, que la seccio sia en ciphac, no en la cartillage, e aquest loc es convenent a seccio, quar es privat de carn e les vayselhs de sanc de lu son luhen.	When we want to do this, incise the epilhom, leave three or four small circles of the epilhom's circles, or a quarter section between two circles in quantity, so that the section is chapped, not in the cartilage, and this place is suitable for the section, which is devoid of flesh and the vessels of its blood are lifted.
E si le metge es pauruc, cove lahoras que extenda la codena del golayro am onci, e aprop fenda la codena entro que pervengua a la canal, mays evite les vaysels de sanc si vetz de aquelas alcuna causa.	And if the doctor fears this, do so when he extends the cord of the gallbladder with forceps, and then cut the cord before it reaches the channel, but more avoid the vessels of blood if you see any cause.
E aprop inscida li ciplach segon que havem recomtat; e es significat sobre la seccio de la canal per le flacma le qual es de aquela eyssit am aquo que es de lu disromput e per la abscizio de la votz.	And then incise the cicatrice as we have instructed; and it is significant about the section of the channel by the flame which is of that eye and of its disordered state and by the absence of voice.
E layssa la plagua uberta per alcun temps.	And leave the wound open for some time.
Donc cum la hora es remauguda en la qual perforacio es temuda, agregua doas labias de la codena de la plagua, e cus aquela sola ses la cartillage.	And when the time is delayed in which the perforation is feared, add two ligatures of the wound's cord, and sew that one to the cartilage.
E aprop administra medicinas que fan naysser la carn entro que sia sanat.	And then administer medicines that cause flesh to grow where it is lacking.
E diyssec Albucasis que la summa del sermo le qual havem recomtat, exposicio no es sino que veias que alcus de aquetz apostemas ja han opilat lo guolayro del malaute, e le malaute es vengut entro a mort, e le ale de lu es entresecat, e alcus van a inscidir le epiglos per so que respire le malaute sobre le loc de la plagua per alcuna respiracio, e sia salvat de mort.	And Albucasis says that the main point of the discourse we have recounted is merely that you may see some of those abscesses have already drained pus, and the patient has come out of danger, with the vein cut off, and some went on to incise the epiglottis so that the patient might breathe over the site of the wound through a single breath, and thus be saved from death.
E per aquo comandero layssar la plagua uberta entro que sia consumida la malicia de la malautia; e es la malicia de lu per tres dias; e donc lahoras comandero cosi la plagua, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And for this reason, I order to leave the wound open until the malice of the illness is consumed; and the malice of it lasts for three days; and therefore then I order thus the wound, and cure that where it is healed.
E aquo que yeu he vist per mi meteys, es que una sirventa pres un cotel e mesec le en le sieu golayro e inscidic am aquel una partida de la cana del pulmo, e yeu fu apelat a la curacio de lu, e atrobegui la mugen ayssi cum es mugit del moridos, e descubrigui la plagua e atrobegui le sanc le qual era yssit de la plagua petit.	And what I have seen with my own eyes is that a servant took a knife and placed it in the patient's wound and incised there a part of the root of the lung, and I was called to treat the patient, and examined the woman as she moaned like one who has died, and uncovered the wound and stopped the bleeding which was coming from the small wound of the wound.
Donc yeu fo confessat que aquela no havia inscidit vena ni guidegi, e le vent yssia de la plagua, e curegui aquela entro que foc sanada.	Then I confess that there was no rupture of vein or artery, and the wind from the wound, and cured her with what became healed.
E no accidic a la sirventa si no rauquiera en la votz, e aprop alcus dias retornec ad miloracio de las suas dispozicios.	And she did not suffer any physical injury nor even in her voice, and soon returned to her usual state of health.
E ara dic yeu que en la seccio del epilhot no ha temor.	And now I say that in the case of the foreskin, there is no fear.

De seccio sobre apostema le qual accideys en le golayro defora, e es apelat hernia del golayro.	On the section about an apostema that occurs on the shoulder and is called a hernia of the shoulder.
Aquest apostema nompnat hernia del golayro es apostema gran segon la color del cors, e es mot en las femnas.	This apostema, named hernia of the shoulder, is a large apostema according to the color of the body, and it often occurs in women.

E en le natural no es engen de curar.	And in the natural case, it is not easy to cure.

And the accidental case occurs in two ways: one resembles fatty nodes, and the other resembles an apostema caused by the obstruction of an artery, and in this case, there is fear.
E no cove que·s fassa presumpcio a lu cum ferr sino en aquel que es petit.	And do not allow him to make presumption as if he were a master only in the one who is small.
E tu proha aquel e investigua aquel am le dit, e si atrobas lu semblant a nodi gras, e no es suspendut am alcuna de las venas, lahoras tu inscideys aquel ayssi cum les nodes, e extratz aquel am aquo que conte lu de la pel e bursiclam; e sino, lahoras es perscrutat tot le sieu esser, e aprop cura le loc am aquo que cove de curacio entro que sia sanat.	And you probe that area and investigate the one he points out. If you find a hard lump, and it is not suspended by any of the veins, then you incise that area like a node, extract it from the skin and bursicle it; otherwise, you thoroughly examine his entire condition, and place the affected area in such a way as to facilitate healing until it is healed.

De seccio de las specias de nodes.	Of the sections on the species of nodes.
Dels nodes so motas specias e yeu ja he dit totas las specias de lor en la divisio.	Of the joints, there are various species, and I have already described all the species of nodes in the division.
E cove que yeu recomte assi la diferencia entre node e exitura cum fassa dubitacio.	And you must note that I distinguish between nodes and hernias in such a way as to avoid any doubt.
Donc yeu dic que am exitura es caliditat e febre e dolors vehementz entro que es sedada la ebullicio de la superfluitat; e es complida putrefaccio que lahora cessa la febre, la dolor e la calor.	Therefore, I say that in hernias there is a quality of heat and fever and vehement pains until the boiling of the excess is subsided; and when the putrefaction is complete, then the fever, pain, and heat cease.
Mays am node no es caliditat ni febre ni dolor, e conte aquel ciphac leon le qual es al u sac propri.	More often there is no heat nor fever nor pain, and concerning that lion's skin which is on the back.

Therefore, when you come to the treatment of nodes, express that and inquire about that at its beginning from the flesh which is called intermuscular, according to how its form will appear in the caput, which is nearby this.
E es manieyra de inquisicio de apostemas e de totz nodes, e es que tu prenguas aquest sturment e entromet aquel en le loc pus humit le qual atrobas en le apostema, e tu revolveras les tieus ditz am aquel petit a petit entro que sapias que·l sturment ja ha penetrat la codena.	And this is the method of inquiry for abscesses and all nodes, and it is that you take this flesh and insert it where the area is most humid, which you find in the abscess, and you will mix the tissues little by little with it until you know that the flesh has penetrated the core.
E aprop ultima la tua ma segon la mesura de la grandeza del apostema, e aprop extratz le entromes e considera aquo que es yssit en le vestigi de lu.	Then place your hand near the size of the abscess, and extract the inserted flesh and consider what is found in its wake.
E si es fora-getada la humiditat corrent, de qualque color sia, lahoras tu le inscideys am seccio superficial segon que he dit en les autres apostemas.	And if the running moisture of any color is overlooked, then you incise according to a superficial section as I have said in other abscesses.
E si del vestigi de l’intromes no hieys humiditat, lahoras sapias que es gras.	And if there is no moisture from the intruding substance, then you know it is fatty.
E secca sobre lu am seccio havent forma de crotz segon aquesta forma:	And if dry on the surface with a section forming a cross as shown:
ayssi cum t’e ensenhat, e suspen aquel am oncis, e excorja la codena de tota part am facilitat, e guarda la pel o sac, si podes, sobre aquel e extraguas aquela sania am le node.	As I have shown you, suspend it with a cord, and carefully strip the skin off all parts with ease, and keep the skin or sack over it, if possible, and extract the clean part at the node.
Mays si es romput en la operacio, no es possible extrayre aquela sana, e motas veguadas endeve aquo, e lahoras tu la extratz a pessas entro que de lu no romangua denguna causa.	But if it breaks during the operation, it is not possible to extract the clean part, and many clots will remain. Then you extract it in pieces to ensure it does not break for any reason.
Quar si de lu roman denguna causa, pauc o trop, le node retorne segon le mays.	But if it breaks for any reason, whether little or too much, the node returns as best as possible.
E si tu vezes que de lu roman alcuna part petita, lahoras comple la plagua de alcunas polveras corrosivas agudas e strenh la plagua, e pausa sobre aquela que sede apostema caut, e cura aquel del autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And if you see that any part has broken slightly, then fill the wound with some corrosive powders and strengthen the wound, place it over the area where an abscess is suspected, and cure the rest with the other treatment until it is healed.
E si es node gran, lahoras tu cus las doas labias de lu e cura aquel am aquo que encarna.	And if it is not large, then you close its two lips and cure that which is within.
Mays si vena pulsatil es a lu contraria, o no-pulsatil, lahoras tu coyta e huemple le loc de zegi trissat que es vetriol e leyssa aquel streyt per dos dias o per tres entro que·s poyresca la plagua e que repause la ebullicio del sanc; e aprop retorna a inscindir aquo que es romas del node.	And if the vein is pulsatile on the opposite side, or non-pulsatile, then incise and fill the area with one-third zegi (a type of glass) that is vitriol, and let it remain open for two days or three until the swelling subsides and the boiling of the blood stops; and then return to dividing what is torn from the node.

Some of the testicles are swollen in certain men. You should advise them to change their sleeping position, as the testicles begin to become hard. And if you do not complete the incision that should be made due to the discomfort of the patient and the flow of pus, then you must fill the wound with cotton soaked in corrosive ointment and leave it there until the flesh around the fat is eaten away, and then remove it when it is healed.

Capitol .xlix.	Book XLIX.
De seccio de apostemas que accideysso per arceria o per vena.	Of the section on abscesses that occur due to an arrow or vein.
Quan arceria es rompuda, e la codena es consolidada la qual es sobre aquela, lahoras motas veguadas accideys apostema E les senhals per les quals es conoguda que imflamacio e apostema sian per la arteria o per vena: quar quan apostema es per arceria es lonc agreguat en le preon del cors; e que quan inpelleysses le apostema am les tieus ditz, sentes en lu quays sia stridor.	When an arrow breaks the artery and the chain (likely referring to a tendon or ligament) is consolidated over it, then dark motes often occur as abscesses. The signs by which one can recognize that inflammation or abscess is due to the artery or vein are: when an abscess is due to the artery, it is long and extends along the course of the body; and when you press the abscess with your fingers, you feel a stridor (likely a gurgling sound).
E aquel que es per vena es redon al manifest del cors.	And that which is due to the vein is round in appearance along the course of the body.
E seccio sobre aquest apostema es error, e majorment en aquel que es dejos las aysselhas, e en les angonars, e en le col, e en motz locs del cors; e es mot gran, donc cove que la sua curacio am ferr sia esquivada, e aquel que es en las extramitatz, o al cap, cove que sia evitat.	And the section over this abscess is error, and especially in those who have armpits, in the groins, in the neck, and in other parts of the body; and it is great, therefore we must ensure that its cure is avoided, and that which is in the extremities or at the head must be particularly avoided.
Mays sobre aquel que es de lor per imflacio de l’orrifici de la arceria, scindeys en la codena seccio en le lonc; e aprop huebre la seccio am uncis e aprop la arceria, e deliura de las tunicas entro que sia descuberta.	More about that which is due to the inflammation of the orifice of the artery, cut the longitudinal section in the cord; and place the incision near the artery, and deliver the tunics where they will be uncovered.
E aprop met sobre aquel agulha e fay aquela penetrar entro al autre latz, e estrenh la arceria am fiel doble en dos locs, — la qual causa yeu a tu eyssenhegui en extraccio de doas arcerias les quals so en les templars.	And place an needle there and make it penetrate into the other side, and strengthen the artery with double thread in two places — which cause you to demonstrate in the extraction of two arteries which are in the temples.
E aprop punh le loc le qual es entre dos liamentz am spatum entro que yesca le sanc tot que es en lu, e sia dissolvut le apostema.	And place a point in the location which is between two threads with soldering to ensure that the wound in it is closed, and that the abscess is dissolved.
E aprop administra curacio en la qual es engendrat poyre entro que caian les liamentz; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz convenientz ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And administer cure in which oil is applied while the threads are being removed; and treat it with appropriate ointments until it is healed.
E si es apostema per seccio de vena, lahoras cove que tu tenguas am la tua ma aquo que es a tu possible del apostema am la codena, e aprop intromet la agulha dejos le loc le qual tu has tengut dejos la tua ma, e fay aquela penetrar; e sia en aquela fil doble entro que tu extraguas aquel del autre latz, e aprop ligua le apostema am bo liament segon que yeu he dit a tu en le liament de uva4 de doas partz am doas extremitatz del fil.	And if it is an abscess due to venous dryness, then you should hold your hand where you think the abscess is located by its root, and insert the needle at the place you have held with your hand, making that penetration; and take out from one side what you put in from the other side, and ligate the abscess well with good lint as I have said before in the vine fiber of two parts along both ends of the thread.
Mays si temes que extraguam le fil, lahoras entromet le fiel am aquela agula dejos tot le apostema deves la inscizio de la agulha primieyra, e strenh les tieus fiels en quatre locs.	And if you fear that you will take out the thread, then insert the wax at the needle and with all the abscess, you should make the incision of the first needle, and strengthen the four threads at the places.
Aprop secca le apostema en le mieg loc de lu entro que quan es yssit aquo que es en lu, lahoras tu inscideys la superfluitat de la codena, e layssa aquo que de lu es liat. e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	And cut in it what is between the anus and the genitals, not in the middle location, before the left thigh; and let the section be over that heel as I have said is in the anus, and let a transverse section be made, so that the section outside is wide and inside narrow according to the quantity that flowed from the heel being possible, and not greater. For if the section of the one in the anus, which is the heel, flows too much, you should make the section, and it will be a perforation-removed as its ability.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And be aware that there is sometimes one in which the passage is difficult due to this.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And of that one, it resembles a lion's testicle and is round, and through it a light passage is made.

And if it is not thus cut out, then you must either probe it or strengthen it with a proper gesture, the end of which should be like a rasp over the stone, and not escape from it; or you should insert a thin instrument with a curved end into it.

Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if the stone is more than one, then at the beginning you press your hand to the mouth of the bladder, and soon cut over it; and soon push a little there; and similarly do if its spots are more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, then ignorance leads you to cut out that great section, for which happens to the patient one of two causes: either it dies or tries to achieve a continuous urinary discharge, by which means the area is not completely consolidated.

E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place it over that soaked cloth in oil and wine, or in rubbed oil and wrung water, so that the abscess may yield.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	Then lift the patient's leg on its pillow, and do not remove the bandage on the third day.

And now I advise you to use a wire drill, the shape of which is as follows:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	of triangular shape, sharp, inserted in the foot.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And then take filings, and tie it around the swelling, place the stone under it so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And then insert the needle into the swelling, piercing easily where the puncturer will reach the stone.

And rotate the puncturer with your hand around the stone little by little, and complete the puncture on one side before you make it penetrate on the other side; so that the urine is quickly released.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand on what is left of the stone from the puncture in the swelling, for that is cracked, and is washed out by the urine, and the patient is cured.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this cure is not effective for any reason that prevents it, then tie a bandage around the stone, and another above the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then bind over the stone in the swelling with two bandages.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then extract that.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then untie the ligament and modify the sclerotic spot, which is done on the lesion.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And there is no need to tie with silk thread the kidney, but only to prevent it from returning to the bladder. And for this reason, when you tie the silk thread above, you must lift the cord to the parts above, or return it by making another knot, and the lesion will heal as we have said.

De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of kidney stones in women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Kidney stones in women are not commonly generated.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	Yet if there is a kidney stone in any of them, the cure is difficult, and it is prohibited by too many methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is that a strong young woman is a virgin.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you cannot find a good woman who can describe herself to the doctor whether she is chaste or not.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you cannot find a good woman who knows this art, especially the surgical operations.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the location of the section above the ankle in women is far from the location of the ankle, so you need to make a general incision, and there is danger.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if necessity compels you to do this, then you should seek out an old woman who is well versed in these matters, and such a person is rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you are lacking in such a person, then seek out an old and subtle woman, or present an experienced mature woman who is skilled in dealing with women's issues, or a woman who has some knowledge of this art.

And then lie down on that application of the padding, place the patient's thigh in that part, and keep his limb from being compressed by placing him in a position where the stone is located, so do not cut him.

And the section be small at the beginning; then insert the probe into that section, and if you feel the stone, adjust the section according to the quantity he knows the stone will be removed from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that the grains of pepper are small: some are round and pungent, long and oblong, and having ridges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	And know how many spices there are of the pepper that you signify about what you want.

De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	On the section about inguinal hernia.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Aguilous hernia is nothing but the addition of moisture in the white fibrous tissue, which is left by the cord of the genitals containing the humor, and it is named fibrous.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And sometimes it is in the proper fatty tissue, which nature prepares at the part of the humor before it is cooked and becomes another humor; and it is the cord of the genitals between the white fibrous tissue, which we have said, and it is not this but fatty.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to weakness which occurs in the genitals, because this material infiltrates into them. Sometimes it occurs due to percussion made on the genitals.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this moisture having various colors, its color may be yellowish, or bloody, or red, or black and floury, or watery white, and this is the most common.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the signs by which it is known where this accumulation of water is located: if it is in the scrotum, which we have said, then the abscess is round, slightly tapering in length like an egg, and one can see the swelling, for the humidity within affects all parts.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the humidity is in the own scrotum, then the abscess is round divided from the egg and thus one estimates that it is another egg.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the humidity is between the scrotum and the white scrotum, then cut away the scrotum.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And to know the color of the humidity, you draw the color of the humidity in the abscess through a small incision from which the form is preceded; and according to what happens in the trace of the incision, judge what is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Then when we come to the treatment of it, you must command the patient to bleed if this is possible, and often raise his body.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	And then lift it slightly onto its back on some cause a little higher, and place the head under some pillows.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	And then set yourself on the left side of the patient, and command the minister to stand on the right side of the patient, who extends his cloth over one of the sides at the thigh and the part of the miracle of the belly.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	And then take a spatula and split the thigh at the midline along its length close to the pelvis.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And make the section according to right measure, equally distant from the line where you should split the skin of the thighs, until it reaches the white fat layer.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	And excise that, and observe it, and guard it for this: do not go deeper than that; and your incision should be as narrow as possible, and you should examine the excision carefully according to the quantity you can manage.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	And then puncture the fat full of water with a large hole, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And then separate between the two lips of the section with forceps, and extend the incision upwards; and do not touch the nerve at the base of the genitalia, and incise the incision in that manner which is possible to you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	And incise that completely or in parts, especially its thin edge, for if you do not carefully examine the incision, there is no guarantee that the fluid will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if you proceed with that from the outside of its nerve during the time of your operation, when you have completed the incision of the forceps, return inside that, and properly suture the two lips of the genital nerve, and properly care for that as with the other wounds until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the vein corrupted by another illness, then ligate the vessels which are over the spermatic cord, extract the vein, and properly care for that as we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the fluid is present in two parts, then you know that there are two hernias; therefore, incise that part just as you did in the other; and if it is apparent to you that it is an operation, then you perform it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And then you clean the blood, and insert in the sections submerged wool in oil or rubbed oil; and place another wool over it which you have soaked in wine and oil, and spread that over two genii and the miracle of the belly; and place on top folded cloths and powders, and lay those over bran which is according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	And then place two cloths and fill them with well-combed wool according to this resemblance; and make the ends which are pressed with a small stick or wet wool, and attach them to the structure in the waistband of the trousers, one end holding the buttocks inside the other, and the second holding the upper part of the groin, and place two ends on each side on the thighs, and all the structure be secured in the waistband of the trousers.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes this hernia is treated artificially with a cautery at the section instead of using iron; so you take a fine surgical cautery and incise there at the cord of the genii, and ignite it as we have recommended until the white chifac containing the water is uncovered, and then you use the cautery in this form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it resembles Greek letters.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And then puncture that blister, and ignite within it to expel all the moisture.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And then lance the blister with needles, and excoriate it with needles, and then cauterize it with a fine cautery ignited; and incise that part according as it is possible so as to eradicate all of it; and guard well from the smoke that the fire does not touch.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is safer and more distant from the risk of infection, better than an incision.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you encounter a contrary condition such as an abscess during the time of incision or the time of cautery, or the risk of infection, then handle it according to the treatment that is appropriate for the abscess as described.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is afraid and does not expect the second operation due to its horror, then administer a puncture as I will advise; and when you are certified by what we have said about the signs, that hernia is dangerous.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	When you must suture the wound on some elevated part, then perforate the abscess at the lower part of it with a spatula, and place the perforation according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the view be wide enough to contain all the water.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And place your hand firmly over the area, close it, and leave it open, so that the water continues to flow.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And place it over the area where the wound should be healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if contrary to the flow of water at that time you perforate it: and this is not done so that the white linen in the orifices of the wound causes a contrary effect and prevents the entry of water, then you must put into the wound a needle or instrument from which water is extracted from the dropsy, the form of which is described; or apply a small pessary to the region of the wound.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And you must know that the water returns, and is agueguada (probably a term for reabsorption or return to normal) in about six months or until it disappears; and when it has aggregated, then perforate it according to this method, so that the gout passes its days.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter LXIII.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	On the section about fleshly hernia and its cure.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in the section about this hernia, one must fear great harm if not treated properly; for I have seen cases where it was dismissed and only saved by the best treatment.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am recalling the operation in that case and the types of abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that abscesses are found in the tissues where the genitals are composed, and this is caused by several reasons: either due to acute aggravated superfluity, which infiltrates the genitals, or due to percussion.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess depends on the color of the tissue, and there is no pain in it; it is a severe abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And the abscess is hard and encapsulated, of which the color is dark, and there is no sensation in it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And sometimes it occurs due to the concretion of arteries, and due to inflammation of those arteries, as one can recall, or due to inflammation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	More than that, which is due to the inflammation of arteries, it is known by the dispersion of the apstema when touched there among your thumbs; and note that you should not touch it.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	More than that, which is due to the inflammation of veins, it is not dispersed; leave the compression with your thumbs.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that sectioning be done on this type and on the other muscles; for you must incise the cord of the testicles, then extend the skin above, and extract the one from the white scrotum, and deliver the suspensory ligament of the vessels, ligate them, and incise the suspensory ligament after you have delivered that from all parts of the skin.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the skin has already adhered to the muscles, then you must extract the skin and incise it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is an adherence due to any cause in the scrotum, or between what is between the testicles, then you must deliver all that adherence and incise it with a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	If it is a native flesh at the place of adhesion which is behind, then incise all of this that belongs to it, and extract the humor as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then when your operation is complete, fill the wound with lanolin soaked in olive oil and vinegar; and then cover it until it heals.
Capitol .lxiv.	Capitol. lxiv.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Of the cure of hernia that is external.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	It is an apostema enveloped by some envelope similar to a swelling of the testicles, and it makes physical exercise, movement, and walking difficult on the afflicted side.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the cure of this illness there is fear of what preceded it, bringing to mind what comes before.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, incise where we will perform the operation after making the initial cuts.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And I say that you should cut the afflicted side on an elevated cushion; and then attach the suspensory ligament of the testicles to the parts left; and place the codena of the inguinal region on your thighs, which are proven by trial. Have another minister assist you, and extend those on strong extension.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And then incise with a sharp knife through a transverse section along the middle of the vessels among which the vessels are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And then excise from all parts thus as we have said in the extraction of arteries which are in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	And then place a needle in which there is a double thread, and tie that at the beginning of the places where you have incised, and tie the other end at the end of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	And then incise those in the middle location through a straight section according to the length of the body, and extract what is added by the foul and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then cure the wound by the treatment of other wounds in which you wish healing to be generated so that it releases the vessels which I moisten with one of two spirits, which is not bad for this.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if you incise all the vessels, then ensure that the testicles are extracted or that they shrivel due to the incision of the vessels, so that it is deprived of all nutrition due to the incision of the vessels, and that they be atrophied, or that they wither on their own.
Capitol .lxv.	Capitol LXV.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	Of the cure for intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to a separation that extends over the diaphragm, which is located above the abdomen, from the inguinal ring. Because of this rupture in the abdominal wall, some of the intestines protrude through it.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the diaphragm or of its excision. These two types occur due to various causes: through a blow, by jumping, from shouting, from lifting something heavy, or from similar actions.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	The sign of this, when it is due to extension of the diaphragm, is that it occurs gradually over a long period of time and does not happen suddenly. It is an abscess that develops within the pleural cavity, causing the diaphragm to compress the intestines.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	The sign of this is when it is due to the diaphragm's rupture, as at the beginning it causes sudden and intense pain; it is an abscess that appears differently from the nearby visible one, which is due to the intestines' prolapse, and the body shows signs around the areas outside the diaphragm.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the intestine protrudes through the skin, and this hernia is called intestinal bubal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is caused by distension, and sometimes a hole forms in the intestine, where it is stopped up, and this greatly disturbs the patient, and sometimes it causes severe pain, especially when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of the symptoms of this illness there is fear, because it is feared that the examination in that area should be avoided.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the method of the operation is that you command the patient to push the intestine back into its cavity with his hand at the internal parts of its cavity if he obeys, and then tie it over his collarbone between your hands, and lift the patient's chest.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then open the cord which connects the cord of the testicles above, and incise the cord of the testicles completely along its length; and place it in two flaps of the cut section according to where you need to open the section.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if from that section according to the quantity that it is possible for you to let of the humor.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then excise that cyst which they leave the cord of the testicles, while the white hard cyst of each part is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	And then you insert your finger into that which is being excised from the testicle, into that which is between the white cyst, which leaves the cord of the humor, and between the cystic duct, and release any adhesion that is in the rear part of the humor.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then hold the cord of the testicles at the front parts, and with this extend the white cyst in your left hand, and raise the humor to the part of the section; and command the minister to extend the humor upwards while you dissolve the adhesion that is behind with the completed solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And seek around with your fingers that there be no cause of the intestine enveloped in the white hard cyst.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause of it, then peel that away and leave it in the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then you take a needle made of coarse wool, fashioned from several threads, and insert it behind the scrotum, which is below the testicles, at that seclusive section; then cut the ends of those threads which protrude inside, ensuring there are four threads, and place some of them on a cross-like figure; tie that to the ciphac, about which we have said is the base of the testicles with strong ligature in two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the ends of the threads and tie them tightly with a strong ligature so that none of the vessels that nourish them can transmit any cause, thereby preventing an abscess from forming.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And place another ligature a little looser than the first one, about three fingers' breadth away; then with these two ligatures, leave on the ciphac, which is below the testicles, the width of a finger, and cut the rest roundly, and cover it with skin.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then cut along the part below the scrotum at that section where fluid flows, as we have described in what we have said about this.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then apply wool soaked in oil, place it on the wound; and apply the salve which we have recommended (and some times the white wax is cauterized, which we have said near the incision of fear of blood flow, for many times accidents occur there) and leave the salve between so that it may fall.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	And if the application is delayed, then pour water to wet it, and place it over that so that it may fall as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the wound with another treatment for wounds as it heals.

De hernia ventosa.	On Hernia Ventosa.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, it is not seen that anything has been burnt during the treatment of the wound.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first doctors said that it should be done as we have recommended in the hernia that is present; which is that you tie the vessels near the section over which there is ease; and then dry out the middle part by applying a poultice with what operates on it, so that the vessels may fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter LXVII.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the disorder that occurs in the tendons.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes there is a rupture in the tendons as we have said, and apply a poultice to the area.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And the surgeons give little cause for concern regarding the intestines; if they do, it is rare; and return them to their proper place at all times.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged, there is an adjustment in the cavity where you are placing the intestine; and this occurs due to the extension of the cavity, which is in the tendons as we have said. The cause is that the cavity is stretched, and the area becomes softened and develops into a carbuncle, so apply a poultice.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for it is with a cautery as described in the previous narration of it.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured by fire according to this manner: and it is that the patient lies on his side between your knees, and soon the place of the rupture of the abscesses dries up by evaporation according to the width as much as three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And soon strengthen the white cloth that is under the bedsheet once it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And soon take the wick and place it over the area where the cloth is raised, and press it against the belly button.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And soon prick the two raised areas over the end of the wick of the cloth, and adjust one to the other for suturing.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And soon pull the end of the wick out, and do not leave the cloth completely open, nor extend the hole, nor any other cause like this in the treatment of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And soon treat that in the treatment of wounds, and after cutting the edges, cleanse it and restore the wound before it is consolidated; for the cloth contracts and the raised area of rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this place, for it is more conducive to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Capitol. lxviii.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Of the mollification of the scrotal skin.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Spots on the scrotal skin in some men are caused by the softening of the tissues between them, and it is believed to be due to excess moisture.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Then it is necessary for the one who is treating such cases to judge when to remove the scrotum according to his skill, and entirely over the softened part of the natural scrotum; and then adjust two flaps at the suturing.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, sew in the beginning the excess of the softened scrotum with three or four stitches and a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then incise between the sutures; and afterward, care for the treatment of the other wounds until it is healed and the stitches dissolve.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter LXIX.
De castracio.	Of castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is excommunicated, but by cause I am reminded of it in this treatise; and the reminder of it is necessary for two reasons, of which one is so that when a physician is questioned about it, he knows the treatment for those to whom it happens; and the other reason is that we may have occasion to castrate other animals for our young ones, such as bulls, goats, pigs, and similar to animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore say that castration is done in two ways: either by excision or by making an incision.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in that which is done by excision, the way of the operation is to kill the beast in warm water so that its genital parts are softened and relaxed.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those out with your hand so that they are resolved and no marks appear upon touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	In castration performed through incision and extraction, make sure you have the animal and press the cord of the testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	Then lift the suspensory ligament, and incise over each groove between two processes.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	Then incise those glands that you have excoriated.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not incise any of those on the scrotum for any cause, but incise the thin one which is over the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration is better which is performed by traction, for traction firmly leaves no cause of the testicles so that the animal desires copulation.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	Then care for the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter 70.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in males occurs according to two methods: one where there is a streak or appearance that indicates space in the cord of testicles, in which something resembling female characteristics appears on the skin.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes a flow of urine comes from that vein which is in the cord of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	In women, it is special: and the vein of the woman around the clitoris is thus like two testicles of a man, a little more round like the scrotum of a man with its two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the treatment is of three kinds: two for men and one for women.

When you have done this, place the compress on a cloth and command that it be inclined over the right side, and then command that it be well wrung out; and make the compress moisten with condiment.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The fetus's exit is prepared on the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When the horrices of the mother occur according to this manner, consider it, and then incise the second one with your finger so that it is evacuated of moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over the face and neck of the mother, then incise the one that is causing the obstruction, so that it is not retained and causes harm.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And then push the fetus into the parts inside where you place that according to what fits, and order the woman to strain herself several times, and it will be easily delivered by gentle pressure, if God wills.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	The exit of twins or many fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins or spots of many fetuses are naturally born, and sometimes nine or ten, but more than this is strange and needs to be investigated. Yet the causes are mostly natural, not supernatural.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And concerning these, whether they be multiplied, one second, and are separated by ciphac, distinguish those within the ligament in the navel of each. Sometimes they are easily delivered as if one fetus by natural passage, and some remain for several times through an unmanageable delivery as we have reported.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if they are difficult, some of them you should induce labor and proceed to what we have said about unnatural figures, then you treat those as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is subtle and does what she does with ease and subtlety, and with delay, and be ingenious according to all figures as prepared by her leading to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remembrance of that which is formed in the matrix from embryos and are aborted.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some pregnancies are formed in the womb one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and more up to ten. You must verify that a woman who aborts has borne one, another all of them formed, the cause of which is made by the measurement of the glorious sages.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all this covers what is in the science of the midwife, for she must attend to it carefully, and then place her hand on it so that it is proper.
