Lahoras si romania alcuna causa annexa al os del pannicol en alcus locs de os, inscidira aquel de lu am la extremitat del inscissori aquel lenticular, e deliuraria aquel de lu am facilitat, quar es deliurat de lu ses nocument e ses paor.	And if any additional cause affects the bone of the panniculus in some places of the bone, incise that part at the extremity of the incisor lenticular, and deliver that part which is facilitated, for it is delivered from its noxious and fearful aspects.
E si fractura del os no penetra entro al pannicol, e aquo que es abscidit o es ostat del os es la facia de lu, e roman en lu asperitat e satagias subtils, lahoras cove que razas aquela asperitat e erradiques aquelas satagias am razoris subtils per les quals tu has preparat le nombre, de diversas quantitatz per que sia a tu possible administrar de aquels en tot loc les pus convenientz de lor e le pus dreyt de aquels segon aquo en que te perduzeys la tua operacio aquel os trencat e la figura de lu.	And if the fracture of the bone does not penetrate into the panniculus, and what is abscessed or left of the bone is its face, and remains in it asperities and subtle fibrils, then scrape that asperity and eradicate those fibrils with sharp instruments which you have prepared in various quantities so that you can administer from them the most convenient parts for that broken bone and the figure of it.
E cove que administres en la tua razio am la qual razes le os al comensament le pus lat de aquels razoris, e aprop usa aprop lu del pus subtil de lu, e no cesses far aquo segon continuitat entro que pervenguas ad aministrar le pus teon e·l pus subtil de totz aquels.	And ensure that you apply with your reason the os at the beginning to the fat of those razors, and then use closely beneath it the thin pus, and do not cease doing this continuously until you reach administering the thick pus and the thin pus of all.
Mays en quascuna de las autras fracturas petitas capillars e fractura subtil, cove que administres cura segon aquo que perduseys ad rectificacio de lu.	In any other small fractures or subtle fractures, ensure that you apply care according to what is lost for the correction of it.
E es causa que no es ameguada sobre totz les quals han studi en aquela art.	And this is because it is not complicated for those who have studied that art.
E stec sobre aquo que nos scriut havem mostrat en grans fracturas.	And place this on what we have written about in great fractures.
E si le pannicol es retangut quan tu erradiques le os, lahoras cove que prenguas drap de li segon la quantitat de la plagua, e submergeys aquel en oli rozat, e pausa aquel sobre le orrifici de la plagua; e aprop pren autre drap doblat o triplicat e submergeys lu en vi e oli rozat e pausa aquel sobre drap prim e fay aquo al pus leugierament que podes sobre aquel, que no graves le ciphac; e aprop administra sobre aquel liament lat, e no strenhas aquel sino per quantitat que tengua la plagua tant solament.	And if the bandage is torn when you extract the bone, then you should take a piece of cloth according to the size of the wound, and submerge that in olive oil rubbed with rose water, and place that over the wound opening; then take another piece of folded or triple-folded cloth, submerge it in wine and olive oil, and place that over the first piece. Do this gently on top of that without pressing too hard. Then apply a poultice of honey over that, and do not press it except with the amount that the wound has.
E layssa aquel am aquesta cura per un dia o per dos entro que sias segur de apostema caut; e aprop deslia aquel e aprop aministra medicinas am las quals es superflua siccitat, ayssi cum razitz de lin e farina de errs, e polvera de enses e de aristologia, e de semblantz ad aquels.	Leave that point for one or two days until you are sure of the abscess; then remove it and apply medicines to which superfluous dryness is needed, such as linen lint and err seed flour, powder of enisetum and aristology, and similar.
E es que tu fassas de aquestas medicinas polvera que sia pulverizada sobre la plagua, ayssi cum son secas; e universalment, administra en aquel tota medicina de proprietat de la qual es que abstergesca e no mordique.	And you make of these medicines a powder that is finely sifted over the wound, such as being dry; generally, apply all medicine to which it cleanses and does not irritate.
E guarda te segon la tua vertut que la plagua en la tua curacio sia neta; e no sia en lu surdicia de enguent ni autra; ni no layssas agreguar virulencia en lu; quar quan es ajustada sobre le pannicol del cervel, corromp aquel e poyreys aquel, e accideys sobre le malaute aprop aquo malicia maligna.	And preserve it according to its virtue so that the wound in your cure be clean; do not let there be surdicia of ointment or other in it; nor allow virulence to aggregate in it; for when it is applied over the cervele (brain) cloth, it corrupts that and spoils it, and you will injure the patient with this malignant evil.
E accideys en le ciphac del cap, cum de lu es mondificat le os e majorment quan es menspresada la cura de lu, e es negror en la superficia de lu; e donc considera lahoras si accideys al malaute les accidentz que havem ditz, sapias que es parnicios ses tot dopte.	And you will injure the scalp of the head, as it is modified by the bone and especially when the cure of it is neglected, and there is blackness on the surface of it; and therefore consider whether injury to the patient has occurred as we have said the accidents, know that it is harmful indeed and do all possible to avoid it.
E si no accideys negror sino de la medicina que es pausada desus, e es en vertut de aquela medicina que fassa aquela negror, lahoras cove que tu prenguas de mel una partida e de oli rozat partidas iii, e am aquels linieys un drap, e aprop pausa aquel sobre le ciphac; e aprop cura aquel am las specias de curacio que conveneys entro que sia sanat.	And if the blackness occurs only due to the medicine that is applied above, and it is caused by that medicine, then take part of honey and part of rubbed oil in equal parts, and line a cloth with those lines, and place it over the scab; and cure it with the species of healing that you deem appropriate until it is healed.
Capitol .iii.	Capitol. iii.
De restauracio del nas quan es trincat.	For the restoration of the nose when it is broken.
Sapias que no es trencat del nas sino doas partidas ensemps pus sobiranas, o una de aquelas alcunas veguadas, per so quar en lu has dos osses, quar la partida dejos es cartillaginosa, e no es trencada e no accideys a lu sino atricio e tortuositat e sinuitat.	Know that it is not the nose that is broken, but two parts together with some superfluous tissue above them, or one of those few layers, because in the nose there are two bones. The part that remains is cartilaginous and not broken; hence, you do not injure it, but rather apply friction, tortuosity, and sinuosity.
Mays si es trencada la una de las doas partidas de lu, lahoras cove que tu intrometas le dit petit en le sieu nas, e que engualhas aquela fractura dedintz am le tieu dit indic, e am le dit pous defora, entro que retorne le nas segon la sua figura natural.	But if one of the two parts is broken, then you must introduce the small bone into the nostril, and equalize that fracture inside with your finger, and externally with your thumb, until the nose returns to its natural shape.
E sia fayt aquo per tu am facilitat, e guarda te que no caja per aquela tua operacio sobre le malaute delor.	And this is done for your convenience, and ensure that you do not aggravate the pain in the sick person's thigh during your operation.
E si la fractura es en la pus sobirana partida del nas, e le dit no perve ad aquela, lahoras cove que sia equat am la extremitat del ray en le qual sia petita grossitut.	And if the fracture is in the upper part of the nose, and cannot reach there, then you should treat it at the end of the nasal bone where there is a swelling.
E si la fractura es en doas partidas, lahoras tu fay le semblant de aquo.	And if the fracture is in two parts, then you make the likeness of this.
E coyta te am restauracio de lu en le primier dia de la fractura, si es possible; e sino, lahoras aprop le vii o·l x deves le repaus del apostema caut.	And apply this on the restoration of it on the first day of the fracture, if possible; otherwise, soon after the seventh or eighth day, you should rest the apostema with a cautery.
E aprop entromet en la extremitat del nas una meca de drap de li, si la fractura es en una partida, o metz doas calguas, si la fractura es en doas partidas, e sia en la calgua grossitut de tanta quantitat que umpla le trauc del nas.	And insert a piece of linen cloth at the end of the nose, if the fracture is in one part, or two slips of leather, if the fracture is in two parts, and ensure that the slip of leather has such a swelling as to fill the nostril.
E diysso alcus dels antics restauradors que las calguas sian enfundudas en boder, e sian permudadas en tot dia, mays no es vist a mi; habantz cove que la meca sia enfunduda en album de huou comfit am polvera de moli; e aprop layssa la qualgua entro que l’os sia fermat e sia endurazida la cartillage.	And some of the ancient restorers say that the leather strips should be impregnated with balsam, and used throughout the day. But this is not what I see; instead, you should ensure that the cloth is soaked in balsam of Hungary and powdered alum; and leave it in place until the bone is set and the cartilage becomes hardened.
E alcunas veguadas sia entromes en le nas, en loc de calgua, pena de auca pus que es envolopada de drap de li leon; e sia que ja te la fractura del nas pus vehement e que le malaute no sia prohibit de inspiracio.	And sometimes gout is in the nose, instead of the foot, due to cold wrapping around with lion's skin cloth; and you have already fractured the nose very severely so that breathing is not prohibited.
E aquesta causa no es a tu necessaria; e si voles, fay aquo, e si voles, fay calguas.	And this cause is not necessary to you; and if you wish, do this, and if you wish, do gout.
E si accideys autra veguada apostema caut, emplastra le nas am cerot o am coto enfus en vi agre e oli rozat, o am diaquilon.	And if another abscess occurs, cauterize it, apply a plaster to the nose with cerate or with a hot cloth in water and olive oil, or with a diaphyllum.
Mays si no accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que emplaustres aquel defora am farina de sizami e am polvera de enses cofitz am album de huou; e aprop pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e no lies le nas am alcuna causa.	But if no abscess occurs, when you need to apply a plaster externally use sesame meal and powder of crushed cinnamon in honey; then place your hand on the patient's lion skin, and do not touch the nose for any reason.
Mays si so trencats les osses del nas am fractura petita o so conminuitz, lahoras cove que scindas sobre aquels, e extraguas aquels am insturmentz que conveno ad aquels; e aprop cos la scissura, e cura aquela am aquo que encarna e consolida, e am emplastres ad aquo convenientz.	But if the nose bones are fractured or comminuted, when you need to split those, extract them with instruments suitable for those; then close the incision, and treat it with what encases and consolidates, and with plasters appropriate for that.
E si accideys plagua dedintz le nas, lahoras cove que cures aquela am calguas e administra canulas de plom entro que sia de tot sanat.	If a plague occurs inside the nose, then cure that with cold waters and administer lead cans (a type of nasal irrigation) when they are all healed.
Capitol .iiii.	Chapter IV.
De restauracio de la mandibula quan es trincada.	For the restoration of the jaw when it is broken.
Quan la mandibula dejos es rompuda e la fractura de lu no es am plagua, reguarda lahoras si la fractura es deforas tant solament, e no es trencada en dos e es curvada a las partidas dedintz, lahoras la sua cognicio es leugiera.	When the jaw is broken and the fracture is not infected, consider whether the fracture is only superficial, not completely fractured into two parts, but bent inward in places. In this case, the pain is mild.
E cove donc, si la fractura es en la part dreyta, que tu intrometas le tieu indic senestre en la boca del malaute; e semblantment si la fractura es an la mandibula senestra, lahoras intromet le dit indic de la ma dreyta; e impelleys am aquel la gilbositat de la fractura dedintz am facilitat a las partidas defora, am la tua autra ma de la partida defora del os; am aquel decentment equa aquelam.	And therefore, if the fracture is on the right side, insert the left index finger into the patient's mouth; and similarly, if the fracture is on the left jaw, then insert the right index finger. Push the gelatinous substance of the fracture inward with ease towards the parts outside, using your other hand on the part outside of the bone; do this gently until it is in place.
E si la fractura de la mandibula ja es separada en doas, lahoras cove que administres extensio de doas partz segon rectitut entro que sia possibla la equacio de lu.	And if the fracture of the jaw is already separated into two parts, then you should administer extension to both parts according to the correct alignment, so that their equilibrium can be restored.
E si accideys conmocio de dentz a disrupcio, lahoras strenh aquelas de las quals speras que romandran am fil de aur o de argent o de ceda; e aprop pausa sobre la mandibula trencada cerot, e aprop pausa sobre lu drap duplicat, e pausa sobre le drap gran stelha decentment fayta, o una pessa de sola engual a la longitut de la mandibula; e aprop lia aquela desus segon que a tu es apparelhada la liadura de lu e que conveneys la applicacio, entro que no es destruida.	And if you encounter a toothache with a fracture, then strengthen those of which you fear will break along the line of gold or silver or lead; and place a cerot on the broken jaw, and place a cloth duplicate, and a large star-shaped bandage properly made, or a piece equal to the length of the jaw; and lift it above according to how the wound is dressed and what you consider appropriate for application, provided that it is not destroyed.
E comanda al malaute que use de repaus e tranquilitat, e pausa la vianda de lu sorbicios leons.	And command the patient to rest and be tranquil, and place a lion's flesh broth on his wound.
E si extimas que ja es alterada la figura en alcuna manieyra, lahoras tu te coyta e deslia aquel al tertz dia; e aprop rectifica aquo que ja es alterat de lu e emplaustra aquel am polvera de moli, am album de huou, o am farina de cisami, pus que tu auras ostat le cerot de lu, e pausa sobre le emplastra lana leon.	And if you think that the figure has already changed in any way, then on the seventh day, you should remove it. Then correct what has already changed in him and plaster that area with powder of wheat, chalk of alum, or flour of cinnamon, after you have removed the cerot from him, and place lion's wool over the plaster.
E adonc cum sta annex e ajustat aquel emplastre sobre lu, e la disposicio del os no es alterada, layssa aquel, que no le deslies entro que sia sanat e strenh la fractura; quar motas veguadas aquesta fractura es streyta en tres sempmanas.	And then, once this plaster is properly applied and the bone's position has not changed, leave it as it is, without removing it until he is healed, and strengthen the fracture; for marks of this fracture will close in three weeks.
E si autra veguada accida apostema caut, lahoras administra aquo que havem dit motas veguadas en la sedacio de lu entro que sia sanat, e sia remaugut aquel apostema.	And if another time a boil occurs, then administer what we have said repeatedly in the treatment of it until it is healed, and cure that boil.
E si la fractura es am plagua, lahoras considera si es pessa del os separada o satagias, lahoras tu te subtilia que ostes aquelas satagias am aquo que conveneys ad aquo en la remocio de aquelas dels sturmentz.	And if the fracture is open, then consider whether it is a bad separation of the bone or displaced, then you carefully adjust those displacements as needed for the removal of those from the bones.
E si le orrifici de la plagua es streyt, lahoras tu le amplifique am le fleubotomi segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And if the openings of the wound are stretched, then you enlarge them with the flebotomy according to the quantity of your need.
E aprop quan tu auras ostat aquelas satagias, e de aquelas no sira remaugut re, lahoras tu cos le orrifici de la plagua si es ampla; e sino, pausa sobre aquela un dels emplaustres que conveneysso ad aquo e encarnan aquela, entro que sia sanada.	And then, when you have adjusted those displacements and they will no longer be reduced, enlarge the openings of the wound if it is large; otherwise, place over that one of the plasters that suit and cover it, until it is healed.
Capitol .v.	Chapter V.
De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.	On the restoration of the furcula when it is broken.
Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquela fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.	Repeatedly, when the furcula is broken in the front part, the fracture is made in one of three ways.
Quar o es trencada, o seperada, o es seperada en doas partz otra que no accidan satagias; e es leugier a la restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que accideysso en lu satagias, e es dificil a restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que la fractura es am plagua.	If it is broken, or separated, or split into two parts without reaching the joints; and it is easy to restore; or as when accidents occur in the joints, and restoration is difficult; or as when the fracture is open.
E la operacio en aquela, quan la fractura es ses plagua, es que tu fassas esser present dos ministres, per so que la un tengua le adjutori e siegua la furcula trencada, e l’autre extenda le col ves aquela partida.	And the operation in that case, when the fracture is open, is to have two assistants present, so that one holds the aid and follows the broken furcula, and the other extends the leg with that part.
E aprop enguala la fractura am les tieus ditz entro que sia fayta la forma de lu segon que cove, e no sia en lu eminencia pauca ni concavitat.	Then adjust the fracture with the pins called entry points so that the shape of the bone is restored according to its natural form, and do not leave it in a depression or concavity.
E si indigeysses mes de extencio, lahoras cove que pauses dejos le titillic del malaute spera de drap o de lana, e sia la grandesa de lu segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat; e exten e eleva la furcula e coarta la spera am la tua ma entro que enguales la frectura segon que cove.	And if more extension is needed, then take a pin or wick made of cloth or wool, of the size according to your need; extend and elevate the furcula and hold the pin between your fingers while adjusting the fracture as required.
E si no podes atirar la extremitat de la furcula a las partidas defora, per so quar es pervenguda al preon, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e pauses sobre le muscle de lu un coyssi migier en grandeza.	And if you cannot pull the end of the furcula to the outer parts because it is caught in the preon, then you should turn the foot over its ankle, and place a medium-sized cushion on the muscle.
E le ministre prema le muscle de lu a las partidas dejos entro que l’os de la furcula sia elevat que es en le preon en sus, e lahoras tu rectifique la fractura e enguala aquela am les tieus ditz.	And the minister presses the muscle of the patient at the parts left between that of the furcula bone be elevated as in the presacral region, and then you align the fracture and set it at the sites said.
Mays si sentes satagias de la furcula e so maugudas, lahoras cove que fendes sobre aquela e extraguas aquelas satagias am facilitat.	And if you feel the branches of the furcula and they are tender, then cut there and remove those branches with ease.
E si es retenguda en le os, lahoras tu ingenia inscisio de lu am un dels inscissoris les quals has apparelhatz ad aquo, pus que havias pausat dejos la furcula le sturment que serve le ciphac; e es sturment de fust o de ferr del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if it is retained in the bone, then you make an incision in it with one of the scalpel blades which you have prepared for this, after placing your hand on the furcula to hold the cautery; and that cautery is made of wood or iron, of which this is the shape:
E es semblant a culier del qual aquesta es la concavitat; e sia la sua latitut segon aquo que has necessitat de lu, segon la grandeza del os o la pauqueza de lu.	And it is similar to a spoon, of which this is the concavity; and its width should be according to what you need of it, according to the size of the bone or its smallness.
Mays la longitut de lu sia segon que es a tu possible a la operacio; que haja doas extremitatz ayssi cum vezes, e la una extremitat sia ample e l’autre streyta.	And the length of it should be according to what is possible for the operation; it have two ends thus as you see, and one end should be broad and the other narrow.
E si la disrupcio de la plagua la qual has inscidida quan has extraytas la satagia del os es ampla, e yest segur de apostema caut, lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura.	And if the wound rupture which you have incised when you have extracted the suture from the bone is large, and you are certain of an abscess, then you adjust the two edges of the wound with suturing.
E si la disrupcio es pauca, o temes apostema caut, lahoras tu uemple la plagua am draps e pulvils segon la quantitat de la scissura de la plagua.	And if the wound rupture is small, or you fear an abscess, then you use the wound with cloths and powders according to the size of the incision in the wound.
E si accideys apostema caut, lahoras infon drap en vi agre e oli rozat e vi, e pausa sobre aquel.	And if you encounter an abscess, then stuff a cloth with vinegar and rose oil, and place it over it.
Mays la strictura del os quan es ses plagua e ses seccio, es que pauses emplastre fayt de farina de moli am album de huou, e pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e aprop pausa la spera dejos le titillic de lu, si indigeyssas de aquela, e aprop pren humemate, so es torca la qual teno les Sarrazis , que sia mot longua, e sia latitut de lu de un palm o entorn aquel; e aprop pausa pulvils duplicatz sobre la stopa e l’emplastre; e aprop pren una stela de taula subtil de la qual la latitut d’ela sia de tres ditz e en longitut semblantment; e aprop envolopa aquela en drap, e aprop envolopa aquel drap am la stela en lo loc sobre le loc de la fractura; e aprop pausa humemati ayssi cum es revout, e revol aquela sobre le col de lu e dejos le titillic de lu sa e dejos le titillic de lu malaute, e reduzeys aquela sobre tota partida, e quan vezes que la strictura de la fractura am strictura descent, e es aquo que no es occultat sobre tu.	For the fracture of the bone when it is a large wound and section, you pause with a plaster made of flour mixed with honey, place it over the lion's stopper, and then place the bell over it, if needed. Take one of the Sarrazin reeds that are long and have a width of about one palm; place powders in the center of the plaster and the stopper; take a thin table reed whose width is three fingers and similarly in length; wrap this reed in cloth, then wrap the cloth around the reed over the location of the fracture; pause with salves as they are poured out, and roll the cloth over the neck of the reed and leave its tip exposed, leaving a portion of the patient's flesh visible. Continue to apply until the bone is well set, ensuring that this is not hidden from you.
E tot, que no sia mauguda la stelha desobre le os trencat; e per so cove que tu vejas le malaute quascun dia, que quan le liament es mollificat o vezas la stela ja esser remauguda, lahoras tu rectifica aquo e strenh la liadura.	And altogether, provided that the splint is not too tight over the broken bone; so that you can examine the wound daily, when the dressing becomes soft or see the splint has loosened, then adjust it and strengthen the ligament.
E aprop pausa le dormir del malaute sobre le col de lu, e pausa dejos le titillic de lu deves le dormir de lu en la nueyt un petit coyssi; per so que am aquel sia elevat le adjutori de lu del latz de aquel, e donc es elevada la la fractura de la furcula a elevacio del muscle; o sia le bras de lu liat al col de aquel.	And place the patient to sleep with the head elevated on a pillow, and place another cushion under the neck so that when he sleeps at night it is slightly raised. This raises the support for the injured area, and thus elevates the fracture of the furcula along with the elevation of the muscle; or the arm hangs down by the side of the patient.
E no deslies le liament si no accideys en le loc prusiment o apostema, entro a xii dias.	And do not remove the dressing unless there is an abscess or suppuration in the same place within twelve days.
E aprop renovelha le emplastre si has vista la facia de lu ad aquo, e ajusta en la strictura e restaura aquel e layssa entro que sia restaurat e sia coagulat la fractura de la furcula.	And renew the poultice if you see that it is changing, and adjust the support and restore it, allowing the fracture of the furcula to be fully restored and coagulated.
E es strenguda e comfortada segon le mes en xxviii dias, e alcunas veguadas en alcus homes es fayt en mens de temps de aquel.	And it is strengthened and comforted according to the case in twenty-eight days, and sometimes in some cases it is done in less time.
Capitol .vi.	Capitol. VI.
De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	For the restoration of shoulder fractures.
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	Shoulder blade is broken in the middle of the location and not broken of it but the edges.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	And so when the location is broken — and it is broken in the middle of its location — and is not known otherwise than by touch, then according to the figure of the fracture, prepare it and reduce it according to the natural figure in every manner that is possible for you.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc.	And then place over the area powder of ground honey and stop parsley; and then place over the wound a thin slice of table salt according to the size of the spoonful, or somewhat more.
Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	More if you leave the slice concave in some part of the spoon, then equalize that concavity with stop parsley, and then place the slice according to equality.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	And then strengthen over the area with a well-made ligature and ensure that the slice is firmly in place without being displaced from its location.
E considera le liament en quascun dia; e totas veguadas que sia mollificat, lia autra veguada e stren le e equa la stela si es remauguda del sieu loc.	And consider the string in each day; and every time that it is softened, tie it again tightly and equally if it has been displaced from its place.
E jagua le malaute sobre le sieu latz sa.	And fix the patient on his side.
E la spatula es restaurada en xx dias o en .xxv.	And the spatula is restored in xx days or in .xxv.
E donc quan es complit aquest nombre, lahoras tu dissolveys le liament, e que tu scias ensegurat quar aquela es dels osses dels quals la cominicio no es temuda ni lor dissolucio.	And when this number is completed, then you dissolve the string, and know for sure that it belongs to the bones whose beginning was not feared nor their dissolution.
E si procezeys del loc del os pessa e pongeys dejos la codena, lahoras tu scindeys sobre lu, e osta le, e fay segon que havem dit en la fractura de la furcula de sadacio de apostema caut si accideys aqui.	And if you proceed from the location of the bone to the ligament, then cut over it, and clamp it, and do as we have said in the fracture of the scapula with an apostema caut if this happens here.
Capitol .vii.	Capitol vii.
De restauracio de la fractura del pietz.	On the restoration of the fracture of the foot.
Le pietz alcunas veguadas es romput en le mieg loc de lu e aquo tart endeve; mays las extremitatz de lu mot endeve que so ciccadas e comminuidas.	The foot sometimes breaks in the middle of its location; however, its ends move and tend to become cicatrized and comminuted.
E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment.	And concerning the accidents when his thigh is broken it declines to the inner parts and happens great pain, difficulty in walking, cough, fever and much vomiting; and it is declared in the cavity of the broken bone and is not hidden from sensation.
E la restauracio de lu es que sia resupinat le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa entre las spallas de lu un coyssi; e aprop prem als muscles de lu, e ajusta las costas de lu am las mas de dos costatz, e subtilia te en la operacio de lu e en la equacio segon tota manieyra que es ad aquo possibla e que conveneys ad aquo, entro que retorne la figura del os segon que cove.	And the restoration of the patient is that he be laid supine on the surgeon's lap, and a cushion is placed between the patient's shoulders; then press on the muscles of the patient, adjust the patient's back against the major bones of the spine, and handle with subtlety in the operation and equate according to every manner that is possible and convenient, until the figure of the bone returns as it should.
E aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e estopa e pausa desobre astela de taula subtil de sauze o de caligi e de a lor semblantz en levitat, pus que tu envolopas aquela en drap; e aprop subtilia te en lian aquela sobre le os trencat que no sia maugut; e vay am liadura segon retonditat al dors alcunas veguadas, e strenh aquel am strictura decent; e aprop considera la liadura en tota hora, e quan es mollificada strenh aquela.	And then place over the plaster and padding, and place above the thin table of willow or caligine and like them in lightness, since you wrap that in cloth; then handle with subtlety that over the broken bone so it is not rough; and wind it around the back several times, and strengthen it with a decent tension; and consider the bandage at all times, and when it becomes soft, strengthen it.
E si necessitat provoca a desliament de aquela deves corrossio o pruziment, o dolor, o apostema que accideysso en le loc, lahoras tu coyta e deslia aquela e erradica le emplastre e rectifique aquo que accideys per aquo am manieyra de curacio de lu; e aprop reduzeys le emplastre, si vezes ad aquo la facia; e ajusta a lu strictura entro que sia sanat.	And if necessity provokes the death of that part due to corruption or puncture, or pain, or abscess that occurred in the place, then you cut and separate that part and eradicate the plaster and correct what occurred by this method of healing; then return the plaster, if you find it fit for that face; and adjust the structure between which it is healed.
Capitol .viii.	Capitol VIII.
De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas.	For the restoration of the ribs when they are fractured.
Sapias que fractura de las costas no catz sino en locs grosses que siegon le dos; e de las extremitatz de lor de la partida denant no accideys ad aquelas contricio sino per aquo quar so cartillaginosas.	Know that a fracture of the ribs affects only large areas that connect them in pairs; and at the extremities of their front part, no contact occurs except by those parts which are cartilaginous.
E cognicio de lu no es amaguada al sentiment deves la inquisicio de lu am les ditz.	And the knowledge of this is not hidden from the feeling of the inquiry into it by words.
E la restauracio sia ayssi que enguales la fractura am les ditz segon la manieyra possibla, entro que sia engulhat segon que cove, e aprop emplastre e strenh le os trencat am stela, si indigeys de aquel.	And the restoration should be such that you equalize the fracture with your hands according to the possible method, while it is reduced as it fits, and then apply plaster and strengthen the broken bone with a splint, if needed.
E si la fractura de las costas es declinant a las partidas dedintz, lahoras accideys al malaute dolor vehement e punctura, ayssi cum punctura que accideys ad aquel que ha pleureci, e per aquo quar le os ponh le velament; e accideys a lu difficultat de hanelit, e tos, e vomit de mot sanc; e aquesta es de dificil curacio.	And if the fracture of the ribs is declining towards the interior parts, then it happens that severe pain and puncture occur in the patient, just as pain occurs in one who has pleurisy, and for this reason let him have a veil placed; and it causes him difficulty in breathing, coughing, and vomiting of blood; and this is of difficult cure.
E ja les Antixs so engeniatz en aquela am motz engientz.	And already the Ancients were ingenious in such matters.
E de lor so que diso: cove que pauses viandas del malaute que engendro imflacio e ventositat, per que le ventre sia imflat e sia extendut, e la fractura sia impellida a las partidas defora.	And according to them: place the patient on a soft bed that causes inflammation and swelling, so that the belly becomes swollen and extended, and the fracture is pushed towards the exterior parts.
Mays nos avoreyssem aquo per so que no sia causa leugiera a generar apostema caut, si no accideys; e si ja accideys, lahoras ja ajuda ad aquo.	But we advise this so that it is not a trivial cause for generating a carbuncle inadvertently; and if it does happen, then help the patient.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia pausada desus ventoza e aprop que sucque am fortitut; e es semblant a ratiocinacio, mays empero es temut que la ventoza atire las superfluitatz al loc per la debilitat.	And some of them say that it should be placed above the abdomen and near where it is strong; and this seems reasonable, but it is feared that the abdomen might draw the superfluities to that place due to its weakness.
E diyssero alcus de lor: cove que·l loc sia cubert am lana que ja es submersa en oli caut, e sian pausatz pulvils entre las costas entro que sia umplida, que sia la liadura engual quan envolopas aquela segon retonditat; e aprop sia curat le malaute am curacio de pleuresi de vianda e de medicina.	And some of them would say: cover the area with wool that is already submerged in caut oil, and place powders between the ribs until it is filled, making sure the dressing is equal when you wrap it according to roundness; and then treat the patient with a pleursy diet and medical treatment.
E si causa vehement constrenh le malaute la qual no sufferta, e le os punh le velament am punctura ledent, temem sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que fendam sobre le loc, descubram de la costa trencada, e aprop pausem desobre aquela instrument que conserve le ciphac, la rememoracio del qual es precedida, e que inscidam le os am facilitat, e extraguam aquel.	And if the pain is intense and the patient cannot tolerate it, and you puncture the skin with a lancet, be careful about the patient, then cut over the area, expose the broken rib, and place your hand over that instrument which will conserve the chip, the memory of which precedes, and carefully incise the bone, and extract it.
E aprop que ajustem las doas labias de la plagua, si es gran, am cozidura, e curem aquela am emplastres entro que sia sanada.	And when we adjust the two edges of the wound, if it is large, with suturing, and treat it with ointments until it is healed.
E si accideys dedintz apostema, lahoras tu coyta e enfon pulvils en oli rozat e pausa sobre le loc, e que sia curat le malaute am aquo que cove a la apostema dedintz.	And if an abscess occurs inside, then incise and insert powders in diluted oil, place your hand over the area, and treat the patient with what is appropriate for the abscess inside.
E sia ressupinat sobre le latz sobre le qual dorm, entro que sia sanat.	And may he be laid on his back on the one on which he sleeps, until he is healed.
Capitol .ix.	Capitol. ix.
De restauracio de fractura del spondil del dos e del col.	For the restoration of fracture of the vertebra of the back and the neck.
Alcunas veguadas endeve fractura als osses del col, e tart endeve a lor atricio, e semblantment als spondils del dos.	In some cases, when there is a fracture of the bones of the neck, and then apply friction, similar to that of the vertebrae of the back.
E cum aquo accideys ad alcu e voles saber si sara sanat o no, lahoras considera, quar si vezes las sieuas mas ja mollificadas e stupefaytas e mortas e no pot maure aquelas ni extendre ni strenher aquelas e quan constrenges aquelas am les tieus ditz o punges aquelas am agulha e no sent en aquelas dolor, lahoras sapias que no es sanat, e en las mes de disposicios es mortal.	And when this happens to someone and you want to know if they will be healed or not, then consider whether their veins are already softened, numbed, and dead, unable to increase or extend or strengthen those areas. When you compress them with your hands or prick them with a needle and do not feel any pain in them, then you know that they are not healing, and under such conditions, it is fatal.
E si mau aquelas e sent en aquelas constriccio am les ditz e punctura, lahoras sapias que la nucha de l’os es salva e que le malaute guereys am curacio.	And if you feel pain in these areas when you compress them with your hands and prick them, then you know that the vertebra of the bone is saved and that the patient will recover with treatment.
E si ve als spondils del col le semblant ad aquo e voles saber si sira sanat o no, lahoras considera als pes de lu.	And if you see the vertebrae of the neck closely and want to know if they are healthy or not, then examine his feet.
Lahoras si tu vezes que so ja mollificatz, accideys ad aquels aquo que es accidit en las mas, e aprop quan jatz sobre le sieu dos, yeys ventozitat e egestio ses la sua volontat, e alcunas veguadas es resupinat sobre le sieu dos e vol urinar e no pot, lahoras sapias que es mortal, e adonc no trebales en la curacio de lu.	And when you see that they are already softened, attend to what happens in the bowels, and when it is close to their anus, show windiness and desire for urination, and sometimes they are supine on their back and want to urinate but cannot, then know that it is mortal, and then do not trouble with the cure of them.
Mays si no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, la causa es milhor e pus leugiera.	But if no such causes occur, the cause is better and milder.
E la curacio de lu es que te perforses a la sedacio del apostema caut que pauses sobre le spondil atrissat oli rozat sol, o am mugols de huous asatz; pausa sobre aquela aquel alcunas veguadas le dia entro que sia sedat le apostema caut.	And the cure for them is that you should cauterize to induce sedation of the abscess. Place the cautery on the lumbar vertebra or slightly rubbed spine; place it over that area for some days each day until the abscess is sedated.
E lahoras pausa un dels emplastres confortantz e exsitans, e strenh sobre aquel am liament; e comanda al malaute que use de repaus e de tranquillitat e que no dorme sobre la partida am la qual atroba dolor entro que sia sanat.	And then place one of the comforting and existing plasters, and apply it over that area. Order the patient to rest and be tranquil, and not to sleep on the part where he feels pain until he is healed.
E si accideys deves la atricio del os satagias o alcuna causa que ja es seperada de lu, lahoras cove que secces sobre la codena e que ostes aquel os; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua, am sutura si es gran; e aprop cura aquela am alcu encarnatiu dels enguentz, entro que sia sanat.	If you find that the joint is dislocated or due to some cause that has separated from it, then you should treat the joint and hold that bone in place; then adjust the two edges of the wound, and suture if it is large; afterwards, apply a reddening ointment until it heals.
Mays si es trencat le derier del os alhoses, e es la fi de la coeta, lahoras cove que tu entrometas le dit pous de la ma senestra en le cul, e que enguales le os trencat am l’autra ma segon que es possible per equacio segonda; e aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e astelha, si indigeysses de aquels, e aprop strenh aquel.	If the lower end of the thigh bone is broken, and it is the end of the femur, then you should insert your left hand's little finger into the buttock, and align the broken thigh bone with your other hand as much as possible for second-order reduction; then place a compress and bandage over it if needed, and firmly hold it in place.
E si sentes satagias trencadas en lu, lahoras tu fen sobre aquela, e osta aquel, e cura la plagua am la curacio que es precedida entro que sia sanada.	If you feel dislocated joints in it, then treat that joint, set it in place, and cure the wound with the treatment that follows until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Capitol.
De restauracio de la ancha.	For the restoration of the ankle.
Les osses de las anchas tart so trencats, e si trencan, lahoras la fractura de lor no es sino communicio en las extremitatz de aquelas e son inscidas en la longitut e declinan a las partidas dedintz; e accideys al malaute dolor en le loc e punctura, e la camba es stupefacta quan es fractura.	The bones of the ankles are broken, and if they break, then the fracture is merely communication at the extremities of those bones and they split lengthwise and decline inward; pain occurs in the area and there is puncture, and the leg becomes numbed when it fractures.
E la restauracio de lu es que tu extendas la tua ma sobre aquel entro que sia sobre la fractura qual es la figura de lu.	And the restoration of it is that you place your hand over that area which is at the fracture where its shape is.
E si fractura es en la extremitat de lu tant solament, lahoras tu enguala aquela segon que a tu es apparelhat per equacio engual entro que sia asemblat a la sua figura natural.	And if the fracture is only in the extremity of the limb, then you equalize it according to what appears to you by equilibrium, placing it so that it resembles its natural figure.
Mays si la fractura es en le lonc o que ja declina a las partidas dejos, lahoras tu fay jaser le malaute sobre le sieu ventre entro que sia preparada a tu la restauracio de aquela fractura.	But if the fracture is in the middle or already declining towards the parts, then you lay the limb on its side with its abdomen prepared for the restoration of that fracture.
E donc quan auras engualada aquela, pausa sobre lu emplastre, e aprop pausa sobre aquel astela de fust o de codena, e strenh per strictura sobre la qual no temas punctacio de fractura ni remocio de la stelha.	And when you have equalized it, apply a plaster over it, and place a wick or stick astelia over that area, and bind it tightly so that you fear neither the puncture of the fracture nor the removal of the stick.
E enguala la concavitat am aquo que uempla aquela entro que aquela prengua la strictura segon equalitat, e comanda al malaute que dorma sobre le sieu dos o desobre le sieu costat sa.	And equalize the cavity with what fills it so that it takes the binding according to equality, and command the patient to lie on his back or on his side.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu cessa de extencio de lu e de la sua restauracio entro que sia sedat le apostema caut, e pausa sobre lu aquo que sede aquel segon que es precedit; e aprop retorna a la restauracio de lu, e strenh aquel ayssi cum cove.	But if an abscess forms, then you cease the extension of it and its restoration until the abscess is sedated, and apply something to soothe it as previously instructed; and then return to its restoration, and bind it accordingly.
E si accideysso en le os satagias o son comminuidas, lahoras tu las tratz.	And if accidents occur in the bones or are fractured, then you treat them.
Capitol .xi.	Capitol. xi.
De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	For the restoration of the fracture of theadjuctor.
Adjutori es aquo que es entre le coyde entro al cap de la spalla.	Adjutori is that which is between the codex and the head of the shoulder.
E si es trencat, lahoras la restauracio de lu es en una de doas manieyras, de las quals es la una que tu prenguas fust pla de migiera groceza segon aquesta forma:	And if it is broken, then the restoration of it is in one of two ways, of which one you should use a rod of rough wood according to this form:
E sian liatz en doas extremitatz dos liamentz, e aprop sia suspendut del loc elevat.	And attach two strings at the ends, and then suspend them from the elevated location.
E segua le malaute sobre una sezela; e aprop gieta fora le sieu bras trencat sobre le fust entro que pervengua al titillic de lu en le mieg loc del qual sia annexa la curvitat del fust.	And place the patient on a cushion; and then hang out his broken arm on the rod until it reaches the nodal point of which the curvature of the rod is attached.
E aprop suspen sobre aquel alcuna causa greu, o·l minestre extenda aquel a las partidas dejos; e aprop le metge eque la fractura am las sieuas mas ensemps, entro que la fractura retorne segon que cove.	And place it suspended above something heavy, or the servant extend it to the parts left; and then the doctor hold the fracture with his hands at the same time, until the fracture returns according to its natural course.
E l’autra manieyra es que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sieua cervitz e suspen la ma del col de lu am liament; e aprop comanda a dos ministres que la un de lor tengua aquo que es desobre la fractura am las suas mas; e l’autre tengua le pus dejos de lu; e quascu de lor extenda a la sua partida.	And another way is that the patient be supine on his neck and suspend the neck with a liament; then command two ministers that one of them hold what is above the fracture with his hands; and the other hold the rest of him; and each of them extend to their part.
E si voles que la extencio sia pus fort, lahoras tu strenh sobre la fractura am liament e sobre aquela am autre liament, e quascu dels dos ministres extendan a doas suas partidas.	And if you want the extension to be stronger, then strengthen the area above the fracture with one liament and another liament at the other place, and each of the two ministers extend to their parts.
E donc si la fractura es propinquada a la extremitat del muscle, lahoras cove que sia pausat la mitat del liament sobre le citillic e l’autre dejos la fractura deves le coyde.	And therefore, if the fracture is near the extremity of the muscle, then place the middle of the liament over the tendon and let the other end be at the fracture to hold it.
E semblantment si la fractura es propdana al coyde, lahoras cove que sia pausat le liament sobre aquel loc e sobre aquel coyde.	And similarly, if the fracture is near the joint, then place the liament at that location and over the joint.
Enguala aquela am facilitat e ses trebal, e aprop quant sira engualada segon que cove e es applicada per bona applicacio, lahoras strenh aquela si no accideys apostema caut.	Equalize that with ease and your work, and then strengthen it when it is equalized according to what is needed and applied properly.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras layssa la strictura entro al vii dia, e pausa sobre lu lana sutza enbeguda en vi agre e oli rozat entro que repause le apostema, e lahoras tu stren aquela.	But if an abscess occurs on the fifth day, then leave the string in place, place a pad of wool soaked in wine and olive oil under it, and when the abscess relaxes, then remove that.
E la manieyra de strenher aquela es que pauses emplastre sobre la fractura, e aprop pausa envolopament de drap nau sobre le emplastre; e aprop ajuste le bras sobre aquel adjutori, e pause la sua ma uberta sobre le sieu muscle.	The manner of removing it is to place a poultice over the fracture, and then wrap a cloth around the poultice; then adjust the arm on this support, and place your hand open over its muscle.
E pausa le drap e strenh sobre le adjutori le bras per so que·l bras sia en loc de stelhas, si no prohibeys de aquo alcuna causa del os trencat.	And place the cloth and firmly hold the arm on this support so that the arm is in a stable position, unless some cause of the broken bone prevents you from doing so.
E lahoras usa de stelhas.	And then use stays (or splints).
E es que pauses sobre la fractura aquela stela que sia pus lada e pus fort de las autras stelas; e pausa entre quascuna stela la latitut del dit, e sia la longitut de las stelas segon la trencadura am addicio de tres ditz de tota partida.	And you place that stay over the fracture which is both wider and stronger than the other stays; and between each stay, you leave the width of a digit, and the length of the stays according to the breakage plus the width of three digits in total.
E aprop strenh sobre las stelas am la strictura la qual he dita al comensament del capitol.	And then firmly hold the stays with the string which I mentioned at the beginning of this chapter.
E es que la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura sia pus streyt.	And it is that your pressure on the place of the fracture should be more straight.
E quant pus es alonguada la fractura sia la strictura menor.	And when the fracture is longer, make the pressure less.
E donc si vezes le situament de las stelas e la strictura ayssi cum havem dit en la hora en la qual restauras le membre al sieu assituament, lahoras tu fay.	And so, if you place the position of the bones and apply pressure as we have said when restoring the member to its position, then you do this.
E si temes apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la strictura e las stelas entro al dia vii ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you fear an abscess, wait, then leave the pressure and bones in place as we have said.
E aprop considera le liament en totas partidas per tres dias per so que no accida en le loc pruziment o imflacio; o es prohibida la vianda pervenir al membre per disposicio de superfluitat de strictura; e donc rectifiqua tot aquo segon que havem dit.	And then consider the ligament in all parts for three days so that no infection or inflammation occurs; or is forbidden food to reach the member due to the excess of pressure; and so correct all this as we have said.
Mays si tu yest sobre confizanssa que no accida alcuna causa de aquo, lahoras no deslias la liguadura sino aprop tres dias o mays.	But if you are confident that no cause of this will occur, then do not release the bandage for at least three days or more.
E sia la sua dormicio del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e las sieuas mas sian sobre le stomac.	And let the patient lie on their back, and their hands be over their stomach.
E pausa sobre le adjutori cocena plena de lana engualment, e considera en tota hora de la nueyt o del dia que no sia deliada ni dissolta la figura del membre trencat, o que sia le liament mollificat, donc rectifica aquo tot am la tua vertut.	And place yourself over the assistant who is holding a woolen blanket, and consider at all times of the night or day that the figure of the broken limb should not be altered nor the ligament softened, therefore correct this entirely with your virtue.
E pausa la vianda del malaute segon le orde le qual havem denant mes, enayssi que la vianda sia subtil en le comensament entro que es comensat strenher; e lahoras cove que egrossas la vianda de lu.	And place the food for the patient according to the order we have mentioned, ensuring that the food starts subtle and gradually strengthens; then cover to thicken the food with it.
Quar de constuma del adjutori e de la camba de lu es que sian strengutz en xl dias; e lahoras cove que sian desliatz e sia administrat banh e sia medicat am enguentz los quals rectifican aquel.	Four days after, it is customary for the assistant and the belt to be strengthened for 10 days; then cover to make them loose, and apply baths and ointments which correct that.
E si la fractura es layha atrita, lahoras tu no deslies de aquela le liament e las stelhas entro a l dias o entro a dos meses.	And if the fracture has been irritated, then do not make them loose of the ligament and the stitches for 10 days or up to two months.
Capitol .xii.	Capitol.xii.
De restauracio de fractura del bras.	On the restoration of fracture of the arm.
Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus.	The arm is composed of two bones, which are called the ulna and the radius; the former is small, and is that which extends from the thumb side, while the latter is large and is placed next to the small one.
E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	And if the large or small fire stick is broken forcefully, and you must break them together forcefully.
E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera.	And when the small fire stick is broken above, then the restoration of it is light, and the healing of it is even lighter.
E quan es trencat le focil de lu dejos la fractura de lu es mala, e la sanacio de lu es dificil.	And when the fire stick is broken, I leave the fracture to be bad, and the healing of it to be difficult.
E pus mala de aquela es quan son trencatz dos osses essemps.	And worse than that is when two common bones are broken.
Donc si l’os le qual es trencat es le focil petit desus, lahoras es convenient al metge, deves la restauracio de lu, que pauze petita extencio am facilitat entro que aquel sia engualhat.	And so, if the bone that is broken is the small fire stick above, then it is convenient for the doctor to perform the restoration of it, allowing a small extension with facilitation until that which is broken is equalized.
Mays si le focil gran es aquo que es trincat, lahoras cove que pause extencio pus vehement.	But if the large fire stick is what is broken, then you must allow greater extension more vigorously.
E si les dos focils so ensemps trincatz, lahoras cove que tu pauses la extritura mot pus fort.	And if both fire sticks are broken together, then you must allow greater extension more forcefully.
E cove que pauses la figura de la ma deves la restauracio de lu e la extencio de lu estenduda sobre un coyssi, e sia le pols de la ma a las partidas desus, pus aut que totz les autres ditz, e le dit auricular sia pus bas dels autres ditz, e le malaute sia cezent sobre una cezela cayrada.	And you must place the figure of your hand for the restoration and extension of it on a cushion, with the wrist of the hand above, more so than all others, and the auricular finger below the other fingers, and the thigh be placed over a sloping bench.
E sia un coyssi denant lu en la altetut o endreyt de lu, per so que·l malaute no encorra trebalh.	And place a cushion in front of them at their head or side, so that the patient does not further strain.
E aprop le ministre extenda le bras de la partida pus dejos am la sieua ma o am liament, e autre ministre extenda desus semblantment.	And then the minister extends the arm of the affected side and places it either on his own hand or on a cushion, and another minister extends it over similarly.
E aprop le metge engualhe le os entro que redugua aquel segon la milhor figura que pot.	And then the doctor aligns the bone within the joint according to the best shape it can be placed in.
E si en la factura del os so satagias, lahoras te perforsa raduzir tota pessa en le sieu loc am la tua vertut.	And if there are fragments in the fracture of the bone, then you must force to reduce all pieces to their place with your virtue.
E si appar en lu satagia separada que punh la codena e no es a tu speransa en la restauracio de lu, lahoras tu fen sobre lu e osta aquela segon la manieyra la qual havem dita desus.	And if there appears a separated fragment that cannot be reduced to your satisfaction in the restoration of the bone, then you set it as best you can according to the manner we have said above.
Mays si la fractura es am plagua, yeu ja he fayt ad aquo capitol singular, e donc pren la curacio de aquel.	More if the fracture is comminuted, I have dealt with that in a separate chapter, and therefore take up the treatment of that.
E si accideys apostema caut al comensament de la tua restauracio, lahoras tu lineys un drap am cerot fayt de oli rozat e cera blanca, e sia migier entre specitut e subtilitat, e strenh drap sobre aquel am strictura subtil entro que le apostema sia cedat; e lahoras remau le cerot e pausa emplastre preparat de polvera de moli am clayre de huou, e aprop pausa stelhas; e sia la stela la qual es pauzada sobre aquela fractura pus lada e pus fort.	And if an abscess occurs at the beginning of your reduction, then you line a cloth with rosin oil and white wax, making it medium in thickness. Place the cloth firmly over the area with a subtle constriction to allow the abscess to drain; then remove the wax and apply an ointment prepared from powder of molybdenum and honey, and cover it with a bandage; let the bandage be placed on that fracture, slightly aside and more strongly.
E sapias que·l nombre de las stelas del bras so vi en las majors disposicios, o sia la fractura en un focil o en dos focils ensemps.	And know that the number of the bones in the arm I saw in the major dispositions, or rather the fracture in one joint or in two joints together.
E aprop pausa la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura pus fort e pus vehement, e quan mays sira la extrictura a las partidas desus de la fractura o a las partidas pus bassas de lu, pausa la strictura un pauc pus molh segon que es precedida la rememoracio de lu en le comensament del capitol.	And then place your compression firmly on the location of the fracture more strongly and more vigorously, and the stronger the compression on the parts above the fracture or on the lower parts, place the compression a little more gentle according to how the memory of it is recalled at the beginning of the chapter.
E les draps que so envolopatz sobre la fractura sian draps mols humitz, e no sian durs ni aspres, e·l fiel am le qual es strenhut sia de li propriament migier entre subtil e gros, ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And the cloths that you wrap around the fracture should be moist but not hard or rough, and the fat of the liver which is strengthened should be of refined meat between fine and coarse, as we have recommended.
E considera le membre e·l liament aprop alcus dias.	And consider the limb and the ligament for several days.
E si accideys alcuna causa de la qual rectificacio es necessaria, ayssi cum prusiment le qual accideys al membre, e lahoras cove que tu enbroques le membre am aygua cauda entro que cesse aquel pruziment.	And if any cause arises for which correction is necessary, as you anticipate what may happen to the limb, then immerse the limb in water until that anticipation ceases.
E leysses le membre no costreyt entro que repause, e aprop torna la strictura.	And leave the limb not compressed until it rests, and then remove the compression.
E si la extrictura ja es mollificada e l’os ja es remaugut e semblantz ad aquels, lahoras rectifiqua tot aquo am la tua vertut.	And if the stricture is already softened and the bone is healed and resembles those, then correct all of this with your virtue.
E considera mays si le nutriment es prohibit pervenir al membre per superfluitat de strictura, quar lahoras cove que mollifiques aquel un petit e laysses aquel per alcus dias entro que corra ad aquel le nutriment, e aprop strenh aquel.	And consider more if the nourishment is prohibited from reaching the member due to excessive stricture, so that you soften it a little and leave it for some days until nutrition flows to it, and then strengthen it.
Mays si al malaute no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas que havem ditas, lahoras no cove que sia desliat entro aprop xx dias o enviro de aquels.	And if to the patient none of the causes we have mentioned occur, then it is not necessary for it to be let loose within about ten days or around those.
E aprop sia suspenduda la ma del malaute per la sua vertut de movement agitatius, e fay aquel dormir sobre le sieu dos.	And place the hand of the patient with its virtue of movement-agitating substances, and make it sleep on its back.
E sapias que aquesta fractura es restaurada en xxx dias o en xxxii dias, o fort leu es restaurada en xxviii dias, e tot aquo es segon la disposicio de las compleccios e las disposicios de la vertut.	And know that this fracture is restored in thirty days or in thirty-two days, or more thoroughly in twenty-eight days, and all of this is according to the disposition of the complexions and the dispositions of the virtue.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter XIII.
De restauracio de fractura de la pinche de la ma e dels ditz.	On the restoration of fractures of the hand and fingers.
Sapias que a la pinche de la ma e als nuzes dels ditz tart endeve fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio motas veguadas.	Know that at the tip of the hand and the joints of the fingers there must be tenderness on palpation, and do not damage them but rub with visible motas.

E aprop le ministre extenda les osses trencatz e·l metge engualhe aquels entro que sian congongitz am bona congoncio.	And then the minister extend the broken bones and the doctor adjust those between which there should be good alignment.

More so if the tear is within the parts of the palm, then make a semblance of a hollow in the cloth, and command the patient to hold that with his torn palm; and then hold it tightly with long cloth.
E sia la stelha de cuer am drap en le qual sia levitat, per so que le cuer sia aplicat a la palma; e strenh aquela segon que cove.	And let the salt be placed on cloth that is soft, so that the salt is applied to the palm; and hold that tightly as needed.
Mays si la fractura es a las partidas defora, lahoras cove que pauses desus stela e autre estela de la partida dejos en la palma, per so que la ma sia uberta e dreyta; e aprop pausa la strictura, ayssi cum es revolvuda la ma a la rateta entre les ditz am liamentz.	If the fracture is on the outer parts, then you should place another piece of the bone above the stele and another piece from the part in the palm, so that your hand is open and straight; then place the splint, as you turn your hand like a wheel between the fingers with lint.
E si accideys fractura a alcu dels nozes dels ditz, lahoras si es le dit pous, sia engualat segon que cove e aprop sia strenhut am la palma e si·t voles, pausa a lu astela petita dreyta per so que sia elevada la fractura e no sia mauguda.	If a fracture occurs in one of the phalanges of the finger, then if it is the base of the digit, equalize it according to where it is and then strengthen it with the palm. If you wish, place a small splint on the right side so that the fracture is elevated and not displaced.
Mays si la fractura es en les autres ditz, ayssi cum en aquel del mieg loc, o en le indic, o en le auricular, o en le anular, lahoras sia engualhat e liat am le dit sa le qual siec aquel; o sian totz liatz segon continuacio, e es milhor; o pausa sobre aquel stela petita, ayssi cum havem dit en le pous.	If the fracture is in the other fingers, as in the middle finger, or the index, or the ring, then equalize and bind it to the finger where that bone is; or bind all of them according to continuity, which is better; or place a small stele over it, as we said for the base of the digit.
E considera, en la tua restauracio, e aprop aquela, la disposicio de apostema caut e oppose — am la tieua operacio — am aquo que cove quan accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, segon que es iterada la narracio de lu.	And consider, in your restoration, and nearby, the placement of cauterization and opposition—during your operation—according to where it is when any cause from those occurs, as per the repeated narration of it.
Capitol .xiv.	Chapter XIV.
De restauracio de fractura del os de la coyssa.	For the restoration of fracture of the iliac bone.
Le os de la cueyssa motas veguadas es trencat e es declarat al sentiment segon que es convertit a la partida denant e a la pus sobirana.	The iliac bone, when fractured, is felt according to where it is displaced anteriorly and posteriorly.
E la restauracio de lu se fa enayssi que·l liament es strenhut sobre la fractura e autre liament dejos la fractura, e le malaute sia prostrat sobre le sieu ventre e sobre la cara. E aprop le ministre extenda tot le liament a la sua partida segon la qualitat, quan la fractura es en le mieg loc del os.	And then the physician extends the ligament along its proper side according to the quality of the fracture, when it is in the middle part of the bone.
Mays si es propdana a la razitz de la cueyssa, lahoras sia le liament propda al denolh a la partida del pentenilh, per so que la extencio caja en sus, e le autre liament dejos la fractura. And then the doctor aligns the bone by bringing his hands close to where you have reduced it according to the natural shape, and the bone is joined by good articulation; then apply a plaster and bandage, so as not to affect the limb with an abscess.
Mays si accideys en lu apostema, lahoras tu layssa aquel per alcus dias entro que l’apostema caut sia cedat, e aprop retorna a la tua curacio.	But if an abscess does occur, then you let it be for a few days until the abscess can be cauterized, and then return to your treatment.
La strictura de lu sia ayssi fayta: cove que envolopes sobre la fractura una benda dura, e dobla aquela dos o tres veguadas, e remaugua de lu superfluitat; e aprop envolopa la camba entro que pervengua al talo e a la razitz de la cueyssa. E intromet lonc fiel entre la cueyssa e la camba prop del denol a las partidas dejos, e venguan las extremitatz del fiel de la partida pus sobirana de las doas partz, e aprop revolveys sobre la camba e la cueyssa aquo que superflueys de la benda.	And insert a long piece of linen between the thigh and the leg near the knee, so that the ends of the linen extend above both parts, and then wrap this around the leg and thigh with any excess from the bandage.
E aprop pausa sobre la cueyssa en le loc de aquela fractura astelhas, e pausa de aquelas una stela sobre le os de la camba.	And place something over the thigh at the site of the fracture, and place a splint over the bone of the leg.
E aprop uempli las vacuitatz entre la camba e la cuoyssa am draps mols, per so que sia coagulada la extrictura.	And then fill the void between the waist and the thigh with soft cloth, so that the constriction is constricted.
E aprop comensa am strictura fort del mieg sobre le loc de la fractura am tres envolucios o quatre, e quant mays tu te alonhas am liament del loc de la fractura, la tua strictura sia menor e pus leugiera e pus molha.	And then begin with a strong bandage around the middle over the location of the fracture using three or four wraps. The farther you are from the site of the fracture, the less tight your bandage should be, and it should be lighter and softer.
E aprop exten a doas extremitatz del fiel a las partidas dejos entro que pervengua a la cavilha del pe, e strenh amdoas las extremitatz de las stelhas del autra part per so que·l liament no sia remaugut del sieu loc.	And then extend the ends of the bandage to the parts where it reaches the foot's cavity, and tightly secure both ends of the crosspieces of the other part so that the plaster does not shift from its place.
E aprop leyssa la strectura sobre aquel, don esta ayssi que no accideys al membre corrosio ni apostema caut ni emflacio e semblantz ad aquels; e si accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, adonc cueta te am desliament de lu, e rectifica aquo que accideys tot aprop, segon que havem dit motas veguadas.	And then place the bandage over it so that it is secure and does not cause corrosion, abscess, or inflammation. If any of these conditions occur, you should treat them accordingly and correct whatever has happened as soon as possible, as we have previously described.
Mays si en le os es pessa del os la qual pongua, lahoras cove que tu engualhes aquel segon que a tu es possibla; e sino, fen sobre lu e remau aquel, e cura am aquo del qual es precedida la rememoracio entro que sia sanat.	More specifically, if the bone is severely damaged, you should try to set it as accurately as possible; if not, apply a splint and secure it, and treat the area from which the memory of the injury was recalled until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es strenhuda aquesta fractura de la coyssa otra aquo que sian ajustadas a lu stelhas, ayssi cum havem dit en le adjutori e·n le bras. Mays empero en la restauracio de lu en tal manieyra fayta no accideys al malaute claudicacio; e si es restaurada sola, otra aquo que li sia applicada l’autra camba, lahoras es necessari que claudique aquel del qual es tostemps.	But more so in the restoration of the leg in such a manner, no limp occurs to the patient; and if it is restored alone, or that the other leg is applied, then it is necessary for the other to limp.
E sapias que la coyssa es strenhuda en xl dias o un pauc mes o un pauc mens, e tot aquo es segon la diversitat de las compleccios e de las autras dispozicios. De restauracio de la fractura de la rodela del denolh.	On the restoration of the fracture of the tibia.

Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De la fractura del talo e dels osses del pe e dels ditz.	Of the fracture of the tarsus and the bones of the foot and toes.
Al talo no accideys fractura de tot; mays als osses del pe accideys fractura alcunas veguadas; e als ditz del pe pauc accideys fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio en las mes de disposicio. Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVIII.
De fractura del conh de la femna e del os del pentenilh e de la vergua del home.	Of the fracture of the thigh bone and the pelvis and the groin of the man.
Quan le conh de la femna es trincat, lahoras fay aquela ceser en cezela cayrada, e aprop enclina aquela a la partida del dos un petit, e sia tenguda detras.
